content.prompt: Which of the following likely contributed the most to the population changes shown in the table for Latin American states such as Argentina and Brazil in the period 1800â€“1900 ?

choices.label: Increased economic production resulting from slave labor
Large increases in immigration from Europe
Higher birth rates resulting from the development of antibiotics
More equitable land distribution policies following independence from Spain

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
